to_sky¶

clustertools.analysis.operations.to_sky(cluster, do_order=False, do_key_params=False)[source]¶

NAME:

to_sky

PURPOSE:

Calculate on-sky position, proper motion, and radial velocity of cluster

–> Also changes units to radec

INPUT:

None

OUTPUT:

None

HISTORY:

2019 - Written - Webb (UofT)
